# cool settings,

```json
"material-icon-theme.folders.associations": {
        "jekyll": "Project",
        "jekyll-cache": "cache",
        ".jekyll-cache": "cache",
        "_jekyll-cache": "cache",
        "include_configs": "include",
        "console": "vm",
        "_posts": "Docs",
        "_site": "Global",
        "site": "Global",
        "roblox": "src",
        "custom": "views",
        "stop": "private",
        "attachments": "connection",
        "attach": "connection",
        "preview": "review",
        "lobby": "jinja",

        "system32": "controller",
```
